page.title: 18Home Life - Meals in A.Green
page.content: We did a survey to find out which meals people ate at home. For breakfast most children had cereals. The most popular were Corn Flakes and Weetabix. Other children had toast. Six children had no breakfast. Most children ate chips at least once a day either at lunchtime or at teatime. The other meal is usually a sandwich. Nearly all of the class ate their evening meal whilst watching the T.V. with their plate on their laps. Most children had their Sunday dinner about 1.00 p.m. Roast Chicken or Roast Pork was the most common dinner but others had Roast Beef, Pork Chops or Sausage and Chips. Class favourites were :- Breakfast - Mixed Grill. Sandwich - Salad. Main meal - Chips with almost anything.
